entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
